title: 求助，裝了MOD后出現以下內容
author: a1486077529
txt_content:
Why?怎麼辦？ 



Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation
        The mods and versions listed below could not be found 
                     Thaumcraft:any
      The file "ForgeModLoader-client-0.log  contains more information

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
下一个Thaumcraft就可以了。估计你哪个MOD要求安装Thaumcraft
只有两个方法：
1.删掉那个MOD
2.安装Thaumcraft

replies.author: a1486077529
replies.txt_content:
Quiet_mirror 发表于 2015-8-15 19:27
缺少Thaumcraft
Thaumcraft?

replies.author: a1486077529
replies.txt_content:
a1486077529 发表于 2015-8-15 19:43
Thaumcraft?
為毛要裝神秘

replies.author: Quiet_mirror
replies.txt_content:
a1486077529 发表于 2015-8-15 19:47
為毛要裝神秘
因为它上面写着qwq，要不然无法运行

replies.author: a1486077529
replies.txt_content:
Quiet_mirror 发表于 2015-8-15 19:50
因为它上面写着qwq，要不然无法运行
qwq我看了下貌似是因為拔刀劍，我刪了附屬MOD就可以了，但是加了就出現這個，求解決

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content: 既然他写着缺少神秘mod 就证明你应该安装了神秘的附属mod,检查一下mod的列表，删掉神秘的附属mod

replies.txt_content:
